title: NEET-UG paper leak: CBI arrests ‘kingpin’ near Patna; special court sends him to 10-day custody
selftext: The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) Thursday arrested one of the alleged kingpins of the NEET-UG paper leak from the outskirts of Patna, according to a source. Nalanda resident Rakesh Ranjan, alias Rocky, was produced before a special court in Patna which remanded him in 10 days of CBI custody.
comments: And they were ready to go ahead with the counselling. More than this guy, the entire NTA should be behind bars.
